Hallo, Aku Dinni Rahmawati

Career And Self-Development Practitioner

Halo, Aku Dinni

Aku adalah People Development Practitioner dengan pengalaman 5 tahun di bidang pengembangan diri dan karier. Hingga kini, aku telah merancang lebih dari 200 program yang membantu lebih dari 50.000 mahasiswa, fresh graduate, dan pekerja di Indonesia.

Perjalanan karierku dimulai di Telkom Indonesia sebagai Innovation Management Officer, di mana aku bertanggung jawab mengembangkan SDM untuk menciptakan produk digital yang berdampak. Pengalaman ini menyadarkanku akan pentingnya kualitas SDM dalam mendorong performa bisnis, yang akhirnya membawaku mendalami bidang ini secara akademik melalui program S2 di Adult Learning and Leadership, Columbia University, dengan beasiswa LPDP.

Dengan pengalamanku, aku ingin terus berkontribusi dalam melahirkan talenta-talenta berkualitas dan berwawasan luas, untuk meningkatkan produktivitas dan daya saing SDM Indonesia.

Apa Kata Mereka?

Thank you so much kak Dinni for guiding me with your thoughtful feedback, from structuring my essay to mock interview.

Kak Dinni helps me with excellent advice to link my contribution plans with my current work!

Nabila Sheila

Penerima LoA Columbia University dan Beasiswa LPDP

This mentoring program by Dinni surely helped me in constructing my essay. Her approach to the mentees, how she presented the materials also helped us more in preparing the essay. I also enjoyed her approach, as she did not lecture us and showcased that her way is the best way. She gave us just some theories and feedback, and encourage us to explore our potentials.

Thank you for your service, Dinni!

Farhan Hibatullah

Penerima LoA Columbia University dan Beasiswa LPDP

Masukan yg diberikan sangat relevan dan membangun. Dinni juga willing untuk ngasih list interview question dan probing yang bisa jadi referensi untuk latihan. Saat mock interview Dinni selalu ngasih follow up question yang sesuai konteks jurusan dan universitas.

Thank you and goodluck for your study din!

Anita Khairani

Penerima LoA University College London dan Beasiswa LPDP

Martha Amelia

Penerima LoA University of Melbourne dan Beasiswa LPDP

This mentorship helps me a lot to understand where my position is in the application process, what I lack on and what I can improve. Kak Dinni can pinpoint both my strenghts and weaknesses and give detailed suggestion on what to do to improve my application.

Overall, being mentored by Kak Dinni is very recommended!

I got a lot of priceless guidances from Dinni! Starting from structuring my thought process into very coherent and dense, and also got enlightened through the mock interview sessions.

And yes, I will highly recommend Dinni to be your Mentor!

Joshua Hezer

Pegawai Swasta

Gw mentoring sama Kak Dinni karena bingung masa depan kayak gimana yg harus gw pilih.

Selama mentoring Kak Dinni ngasih banyak banget insight dari pengalamannya dan tokoh-tokoh inspiratif kenalan Kak Dinni yang luas banget. Abis mentoring jadi clear banget apa misi gw di dunia ini.

Daffa Ghifari

Pegawai swasta dan aspiring entrepreneur
